actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to release certain conditions with respect to certain property previously conveyed to the State of Arkansas by the United States.

summary.text: Removes the limitation to use for National Guard training contained in the terms of transfer of a part of Camp Joseph T. Robinson to the State of Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to release certain conditions with respect to certain property previously conveyed to the State of Arkansas by the United States.
